20101204050347.000|20101204050349.000|CCO|POLICIES TOWARDS KOREA, RUSSIA,

20101204050359.333|20101204050401.000|CCO|BLUNT.

20101204050651.000|20101204050652.667|CCO|BALANCE HAS STEADILY SHIFTED 
20101204050652.667|20101204050654.333|CCO|TOWARD CHINA.
20101204050654.333|20101204050656.000|CCO|THE U.S. USED TO BE SOUTH 
20101204050656.000|20101204050657.667|CCO|KOREA'S LARGEST TRADING PARTY 
20101204050657.667|20101204050659.333|CCO|AND NOW IT'S CHINA.
20101204050659.333|20101204050701.000|CCO|THE ECONOMIC RELATIONSHIP IS AS 
20101204050701.000|20101204050703.500|CCO|IMPORTANT AS JAPAN AS THE

20101204050708.500|20101204050711.000|CCO|INVESTMENTS, EVERYWHERE 
20101204050711.000|20101204050712.429|CCO|SURROUNDING IT AND POWERFUL 
20101204050712.429|20101204050713.857|CCO|INTERESTS AND THOSE INTERESTS 
20101204050713.857|20101204050715.286|CCO|ARE NOT ALWAYS THE SAME AS 
20101204050715.286|20101204050716.714|CCO|AMERICAN INTERESTS.
20101204050716.714|20101204050718.143|CCO|>> LET'S TALK ABOUT THE HERMIT 
20101204050718.143|20101204050719.571|CCO|KINGDOM, NORTH KOREA, WHICH IS 
20101204050719.571|20101204050721.000|CCO|RATHER LIKE WHAT CHURCHHILL SAID

20101204050723.000|20101204050725.000|CCO|ONE OF THE WIKILEAKS DOCUMENTS 
20101204050725.000|20101204050727.000|CCO|SUGGESTS THAT CHINA HAS 
20101204050727.000|20101204050729.000|CCO|SPECULATED THAT PERHAPS THE 
20101204050729.000|20101204050731.000|CCO|REGIME WOULD SURVIVE NO LONGER 
20101204050731.000|20101204050732.667|CCO|THAN THREE YEARS AFTER THE 
20101204050732.667|20101204050734.333|CCO|REGIME OF KIM JONG-IL.
20101204050734.333|20101204050736.000|CCO|WHAT DO YOU THINK ABOUT THE 
20101204050736.000|20101204050737.667|CCO|SITUATION THAT WE ARE IN NOW AND
20101204050737.667|20101204050739.333|CCO|THEN GOING FORWARD?
20101204050739.333|20101204050741.000|CCO|>> I THINK THERE'S A BIT OF A 
20101204050741.000|20101204050742.667|CCO|WISHFUL THINKING IN THESE 
20101204050742.667|20101204050744.333|CCO|DOCUMENTS AND THE THINKING.
20101204050744.333|20101204050746.000|CCO|WE HAVE BEEN HERE BEFORE.
20101204050746.000|20101204050747.667|CCO|WHEN HIS FATHER DIED IN 1994, 
20101204050747.667|20101204050749.333|CCO|THERE WAS A LOT OF SPECULATION 
20101204050749.333|20101204050751.000|CCO|THAT THE SON WOULDN'T BE ABLE TO

20101204050752.667|20101204050754.333|CCO|NORTH KOREA WOULD COLLAPSE.
20101204050754.333|20101204050756.000|CCO|THAT DIDN'T HAPPEN.
20101204050756.000|20101204050757.667|CCO|16 YEARS LATER, NORTH KOREA IS 
20101204050757.667|20101204050759.333|CCO|STILL THERE.
20101204050759.333|20101204050801.000|CCO|AND IT MAY BE THE CASE THAT KIM 
20101204050801.000|20101204050804.333|CCO|JONG-IL'S OWN SON IS ABLE TO 
20101204050804.333|20101204050807.667|CCO|MAINTAIN POWER AND KEEP THE 
20101204050807.667|20101204050811.000|CCO|REGIME GOING OR IT ONE THING 
20101204050811.000|20101204050813.000|CCO|THAT HAS CHANGED IS NORTH KOREA.
20101204050813.000|20101204050815.000|CCO|IT'S NOT THE HIGHLY TOTAL TEAR 
20101204050815.000|20101204050817.000|CCO|YES, MA'AM REJEEJ THAT IT USED 
20101204050817.000|20101204050819.000|CCO|TO BE.
20101204050819.000|20101204050821.000|CCO|THERE IS A LOT OF MOVEMENT BACK 
20101204050821.000|20101204050823.000|CCO|AND FORTH ACROSS THE BORDER WITH
20101204050823.000|20101204050825.000|CCO|CHINA AND THERE'S SOME 
20101204050825.000|20101204050827.000|CCO|INDICATIONS THAT THE NORTH 
20101204050827.000|20101204050829.000|CCO|KOREAN PEOPLE SORT OF AT THE 
20101204050829.000|20101204050831.000|CCO|POPULIST LEVEL AS WELL AS WITHIN
20101204050831.000|20101204050833.500|CCO|THE ELITE AND MILITARY AND SO 
20101204050833.500|20101204050836.000|CCO|FORTH ARE NOT ENTIRELY HAPPY 
20101204050836.000|20101204050838.500|CCO|WITH THE TRANSITION OF POWER.
20101204050838.500|20101204050841.000|CCO|AND THIS MAY BE AN INDICATION OF
20101204050841.000|20101204050842.667|CCO|CHANGE TO COME.
20101204050842.667|20101204050844.333|CCO|>> THE HEAD OF GOVERNMENT IN THE
20101204050844.333|20101204050846.000|CCO|REGION, WHEN HE WOKE UP IN THE 
20101204050846.000|20101204050847.667|CCO|MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT, WHAT SCARED
20101204050847.667|20101204050849.333|CCO|HIM THE MOST?

20101204050851.000|20101204050852.429|CCO|AFTER KIM JONG-IL DIES.
20101204050852.429|20101204050853.857|CCO|>> UH-HUH. 
20101204050853.857|20101204050855.286|CCO|>> YOU'VE BEEN TO KOREA.

20101204050856.714|20101204050858.143|CCO|DESCRIBE THE DIFFERENT CENTERS 
20101204050858.143|20101204050859.571|CCO|OF POWER. 
20101204050859.571|20101204050901.000|CCO|>> FIRST OF ALL, WHAT WE HAVE 
20101204050901.000|20101204050903.000|CCO|NOW IS A VERY HIGHLY CENTRALIZED
20101204050903.000|20101204050905.000|CCO|SYSTEM.

20101204050909.000|20101204050911.000|CCO|HIS IMMEDIATE FAMILY AND HIS 
20101204050911.000|20101204050912.667|CCO|SISTER, HER HUSBAND, AND OTHER 
20101204050912.667|20101204050914.333|CCO|PEOPLE LINKED TOGETHER BY FAMILY
20101204050914.333|20101204050916.000|CCO|TIES OR THROUGH HISTORY AND 
20101204050916.000|20101204050917.667|CCO|THROUGH EXPERIENCES AS SHARED 
20101204050917.667|20101204050919.333|CCO|WITHIN THE GOVERNMENT AND WITHIN
20101204050919.333|20101204050921.000|CCO|THE MILITARY.
20101204050921.000|20101204050923.500|CCO|WE HAVE THE MILITARY, WHICH IS A
20101204050923.500|20101204050926.000|CCO|VERY POWERFUL FORCE IN ITS OWN 
20101204050926.000|20101204050928.500|CCO|RIGHT.
20101204050928.500|20101204050931.000|CCO|AND THERE'S BEEN THE GREAT DEAL 
20101204050931.000|20101204050933.500|CCO|OF EMPHASIS SINCE HE DIED IN 
20101204050933.500|20101204050936.000|CCO|1994 ON NORTH KOREA AS A 
20101204050936.000|20101204050938.500|CCO|MILITARY STATE.
20101204050938.500|20101204050941.000|CCO|THE SO-CALLED MILITARY FIRST 
20101204050941.000|20101204050943.000|CCO|POLICY.
20101204050943.000|20101204050945.000|CCO|SO THERE IS AN ATTEMPT TO 
20101204050945.000|20101204050947.000|CCO|ASSOCIATE HIM WITH THE MILITARY.
20101204050947.000|20101204050949.000|CCO|>> BUT WHAT ABOUT THE CIVILIAN 
20101204050949.000|20101204050951.000|CCO|POPULATION?
20101204050951.000|20101204050952.429|CCO|HOW WOULD THEY EXPRESS THEIR 
20101204050952.429|20101204050953.857|CCO|POLITICAL WILL?
20101204050953.857|20101204050955.286|CCO|>> OBVIOUSLY THERE'S NO OPEN 
20101204050955.286|20101204050956.714|CCO|CRITICISM IN NORTH KOREA.
20101204050956.714|20101204050958.143|CCO|YOU CAN'T GO OUT ON THE STREETS 
20101204050958.143|20101204050959.571|CCO|AND PROTEST AGAINST THE 
20101204050959.571|20101204051001.000|CCO|GOVERNMENT IF YOU AREN'T HAPPY 
20101204051001.000|20101204051004.333|CCO|WITH THEIR POLICY.
20101204051004.333|20101204051007.667|CCO|THE PARTY IS ALSO A CENTER OF
